Default: Старый, покрытый ржавчиной кухонный нож. Надеюсь Альп не использует его в готовке.
Он достаточно острый чтобы резать... и ржавчина будет попадать в раны
column3: и наносить калечащиё урон для небронированных целей.

Default: Склееные клейкой лентой палки... И ты называешь это оружием?
Это антикварный меч все ещё остр
column3: и конечно же проливал кровь раньше.

Default: Изготовлена из цельного дерева. Может наносить урон через броню
Меч сделанный из заточеных костей подземных монстров. Хорош если ничего другого нет
Бита из затвердевших котсей подземных монстров. Выглядит внушительно
column3: но может сломаться в любой момент.

Default: Класическая комбинация дерева и метала. Достаточно прочная чтобы крушить врагов и острая чтобы вызвать кровотечения.
Острейший меч в округе, может разрезать почти что всё.
Экспериментальная булава из Мастерской Юдит. Тяжела и громоздка
Юдит сделала этот Экспериментальный Меч с помощью технологий. Выглядит шатко
column3: но в теории может резать и шокировать??.

Default: Judith's finished mace is easier to handle and hits like a Mack truck. You don't want to be on the other end of this thing.
No armor can stand against this sword made of pure energy. How the hell did Judith make this thing?
It's a bit old, but may have a few swings left.
A Korean hoe typically used for gardening. It's an unorthodox weapon but serviceable in a pinch.
A weighty piece of exercise equipment good for upper body improvement and caving in the occasional monster skull.
The dead guards underground don't need their security rods anymore. It'll help you keep the peace in the mines.
Whether preparing a cake or whacking a monster in the head, this hefty tool does the job.
It might sound cartoonish at first, but this heavy cast iron pan can flatten anything in its way.
This handy tool is made of thick metal, strong enough to break stuff when necessary.
A short, fine blade fantastic for taking out enemies with surgical precision.
Primarily a defensive weapon used by law enforcement, this study wooden baton is also excellent for subduing an enemy.
Made of thin, solid metal, it can remove lug nuts and smite one's enemies.
A durable fretsaw with sharp blades and enough teeth to cut through flesh and bone.
A partially-rusted metal pipe cut to a length usable with one hand. It's heavy but deadly.
An aggressive weapon designed to attack enemies from afar with an impressive CRACK, leaving them in pieces.
You can do a lot of damage with two short sticks attached by a chain... Just ask the world's finest martial artists.
This never-dulling blade was a gift from Alexei. Its snarling wolf's head carved into the handle reflects the true nature of its wielder.
An old, shabby mop. Its wood is sturdy enough to fight with and clean up the occasional spill.
Sharpened metal tied firmly to a stick. Slightly primitive, but it should do the trick.
A big rock tied to a stick. Incredibly, the stone doesn't come loose.
A standard, wood-chopping axe. While not designed for combat, it's still capable of cutting through enemies just the same.
A blunt hunk of metal perched on a weighty handle. It can cause damage but lacks elegance.
An axe made from sharpened bones of underground monsters. Fighting fire with fire.
A hammer made from hardened bones of underground monsters. Can they withstand being hit with a piece of themselves?
A well-balanced axe ready for cutting down enemies in battle. Judith really outdid herself with this one.
A war hammer with a flattened head, because physics. It's built for battle, and you'll look cool wielding it.
Judith rigged this axe with extra kinetic energy to increase its chopping ability. However, that extra power makes it act with a mind of its own.
Judith insists this experimental hammer mixes magic and science in unique ways. It's weird, but it does an excellent job of hurting enemies.
This axe was crafted with high-tech nonsense, but it'll slice anything straight in half. End fights quickly by aiming for joints and vital spots. Enough said.
Heavy and Hard-Hitting Hammer of Harm
This hammer uses the magic of science and physics to annihilate armored opposition. Judith performed a miracle with this one.
A long piece of heavy, corroded pipe that takes extra strength to wield correctly.
It's a large, two-handed axe that can cut down trees, but, in Huygen Camp, it's used to cut down other things instead.
It'll take both arms to wield it, but this weapon found in the Gym is enough to crush any enemy in your way.
When prisoners get really out of hand, guards pull out the big guns... or at least these longer security rods. Let's start the beatings!
A pipe wrench is the rare tool equally good for building and breaking stuff. It's heavy and sure to knock some monster teeth out.
A standard fireman's axe is used for chopping through doors and rubble. Certainly, you can find more interesting applications as a weapon.
This heavy sledgehammer takes all your might to wield correctly, but you can't argue with the destructive results.
You picked the perfect golf club to get a hole-in-one with your enemy's head. Four!
Flip it around and knock your target silly with the heavy end, or impale your enemies with the pointy end. Isn't pool fun?
A metal rake with a handle strong enough to block attacks and tines (spikes) at the end good for shedding blood.
This long stick with a curve at the end is known for striking hard things and not breaking. The target, on the other hand...
A well-balanced bat for baseball, bats are also the chosen weapon to smash things and cause damage. Swing batter!
Sturdy metal crutches can help you walk and make good weapons in a pinch. No clue where the other one is, though.
A katana crafted from the finest steel, the Masamune cuts true and has no equal. It is capable of striking multiple adjacent enemies simultaneously.
This weapon is inspired by the legendary spear wielded by Odin of Norse mythology. Gungnir handles like the finest spear and can strike up to two targets simultaneously.
An impossibly sharp and durable blade crafted for use in battle. The last thing your enemy will see before death is their own reflection.
Need a hand? This ultra-strong mechanical arm sure packs a punch! Enemies might try to run, but they won't get far.
*Brum-brum* While slightly unwieldy, the chainsaw has proved useful for killing the toughest monsters. Cut through your enemies in no time!
It's basically just a plank of sturdy wood.
A tattered wooden board with a few sheets of metal and a handle attached. It still holds up alright.
This refurbished sheet of metal should block most hits without falling apart. Maybe.
A shield made of mutant bones and leather. No wonder they're so hard to kill.
A taller, sturdier shield that resembles a riot shield and is probably just as tough to penetrate.
A heavy shield with experimental layers from Judith that should make it even more durable. Let's hope she's right.
Incredibly Sturdy Shield of Legendary Survivability
A supremely tough shield that is surprisingly wieldable with one hand. It can stop almost any attack in its tracks without question.
